manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ACDelco Absorbed Glass Mat (AGM) Battery The ACDelco AGM range represents the very best in advanced battery technology for the most highly developed luxury cars and most advanced fuel-saving technology, including Stop/Start and regenerative braking. AGM Plate separators reduce internal resistance, providing significant improvement in all performance criteria, including increased cycling ability, faster recharge acceptance and improved cranking power in Partial-State-Of-Charge (PSOC). The AGM Range is ideal for highly-advanced stop-start vehicles, high-end luxury vehicles that have higher electrical accessory loads or performance vehicles that require a higher CCA starting battery with improved cyclic ability. Battery Benefits ACDelco Full Frame positive & negative charges 100% Maintenance-Free Spill & leak-resistance Highest corrosion-resistance Highest Cold Cranking Amps (CCA) for Stop/Start Applications Pressurised internally for vibration resistance Mandatory replacement for cars fitted with AGM batteries as original fit Ability to be retro fitted as a "higher performance" option in high load applications

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one, folks!
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2017 Chevrolet Volt.. and it required this special AGM battery. The dealers wanted to charge me $400 to install a new one. Instead, I found it here... and installed it myself (very easily, just search YOUTUBE for installation guidance videos). Lots of money saved. This is the exact same one that dealers would install as well.. (I double checked with a Volt Technician friend of mine). WORTH IT! Get it here and do it yourself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compatible with 2012 chevy volt
reviews.reviewText: It's difficult to source and buy OEM batteries locally. Amazon was significantly cheaper, and more convenient. As far as I can tell, the silver and gold use similar parts on the inside with warranty being the largest difference. Time will tell if it lasts as long as my old battery which lasted 8 years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazon was fantastic in resolving a major issue with this battery unable to hold a charge and under voltage. You cannot return a battery due to hazardous materials. AC Delco customer service was overly confusing with no support. Just pass, look at Optima, more expensive but zero issues are most likely to ever occur.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: $100 less than what the auto parts store could offer for my 2015 Chevy Volt. Being that it's in the rear of the car, installation was more difficult, but that's not a battery issue. Came fully charged at 12.87V and was manufactured the previous month. After pulse charging for a day and installation it tested at well above the rate 660 CCA (about 720 as I recall). The previous battery lasted for 8 years and still started the car fine, but the RC was probably lacking and that's important in electric vehicles as the AC is electric and not engine driven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for 2019 Chevrolet Volt.
reviews.reviewText: It's a perfect fit for my 2019 Chevrolet Volt. Most annoying thing was taking everything out to replace the old battery, but I was able to do it using a socket wrench with 10mm and 13mm adapters. There was a bolt holding the strap down, and it was in a bit of an awkward position, so I used a socket extension, but you may be able to get away without using one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The battery arrived upside down
reviews.reviewText: I opened the box without signs where up and where the bottom was. inside there was another box of the same, on which the direction of the top was written and there were also arrows pointing up. And the inner box was these down arrows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, works great so far!
reviews.reviewText: The battery was a perfect fit for our ‘18 Chevy Volt, easy install, works great so far. Fantastic price compared to local, especially for ACDelco. So far, so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good recently manufactured battery, fast shipping and arrived in excellent condition
reviews.reviewText: Battery was received as described by Amazon. No damage during shipping. It was especially well packed using expanded foam in a sturdy box and was handled with care by the delivery service.
